description.narrative:
This investment aims at leveraging the potential for www.socialprotection.org and other social protection knowledge sharing activities to support policymaking and innovation on social protection.
The Objectives are: 1. Technical maintenance, and further development of the platform; 2. the delivery of services and products in knowledge exchange; and 3. foster the platform´s influence and impact on innovation and policy making.
The main goal and objectives will be achieved through the use of socialprotection.org that facilitates knowledge exchange on social protection by: 1) gathering and systematising high quality information from multiple sources, 2) producing original content and 3) connecting social protection specialists from different backgrounds to share their knowledge.
It is a global investment aimed at academics, specialists,NGOs and government officials.
The total value of this investment is $0.8 million to be expensed over 3 years, starting in the 2018-19 financial year
